about_the_game:
Story:
The world is shrouded with the eclipse of the sun, transforming what once was a peaceful world into a nightmare. The land is left with what was left of its shell of the former peace.

The knight travels through the land to fight against evil, and survive on the harsh days after what is down the Oculant.

Enter the kingdom of Ronia through the eyes of a hermit knight, who had been invited by a mage of the kingdom, one of his close friends. The kingdom has found a new source of magic, and it is making preparations closed doors, having no one else to see or know about it. The mage, concerned about the intricacies of its preparation, sends the knight to investigate more into it, as he himself is involved in it.
As the knight travels through the kingdom, he's unaware what lies ahead of his journey, the secrets of the kingdom, and what the events will change the world the knight knows.

Game Features:
  • Classic Retro Arcade gameplay.
  • Class system. Classes have strong and weakness classes. Use it against your enemies.
  • Score system. Aim for a high score.
  • Retro Art style.
  • Retro Sound Score.
